emptyState.title: No crypto assets yet?
emptyState.desc: Make sure the <1><0>{{managerAppName}}</0></1> app is installed and start receiving

dashboard.title: Portfolio

emptyAccountTile.desc: Add accounts to manage more crypto assets

dashboard.summary: Here's the summary of your account
dashboard.summary_plural: Here's the summary of your {{count}} accounts

currentAddress.title: Current address
currentAddress.messageIfUnverified: Verify the address on your device for optimal security. Press the right button to confirm.
currentAddress.messageIfAccepted: {{currencyName}} address confirmed. Please verify the address if you copy/paste it or if you scan the QR code.
currentAddress.messageIfSkipped: Your receive address has not been confirmed on your Ledger device. Please verify your {{currencyName}} address for optimal security.

step2.open: Open the <1><0>{{managerAppName}}</0></1> app on your device

sidebar.text: Press this button to add accounts to your portfolio

dashboard.title: Add accounts to your portfolio
dashboard.desc: Your portfolio has no accounts the first time Ledger Live is launched. Open the Manager to install apps on your Ledger device before you start adding accounts to your portfolio.

exchange.title: Trade
exchange.desc: Try a few trading services we've selected for you
exchange.coinhouse: Coinhouse is a trusted platform for individuals and institutional investors looking to analyze, acquire, sell and securely store crypto assets.
exchange.changelly: Changelly is a popular instant crypto asset exchange with 100+ coins and tokens listed.
exchange.coinmama: Coinmama is a financial service that makes it fast, safe and fun to buy digital assets, anywhere in the world.
exchange.simplex: Simplex is a EU licensed financial institution, providing a fraudless credit card payment solution.
exchange.paybis: it is safe and easy to Buy Bitcoin with credit card from PayBis. Service operates in US, Canada, Germany, Russia and Saudi Arabia.
exchange.luno: Luno makes it safe and easy to buy, store and learn about cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum
exchange.shapeshift: ShapeShift is an online marketplace where users can buy and sell digital assets. It is a fast and secure way for the world to buy and sell digital assets, with no lengthy signup process, no counterparty risk, and no friction.
exchange.genesis: Genesis is an institutional trading firm offering liquidity and borrow for digital currencies, including bitcoin, bitcoin cash, ethereum, ethereum classic, litecoin, and XRP.
exchange.kyber: Kyber is a trading platform for exchange and conversion of ERC-20 tokens

addAccounts.title: Add accounts
addAccounts.success: Account successfully added to your portfolio
addAccounts.success_plural: Accounts successfully added to your portfolio

createNewAccount.title: Add a new account
createNewAccount.noOperationOnLastAccount: There are no transactions on your last created <1><0>{{accountName}}</0></1> account. You must first receive crypto assets on that account before you can add a new one.
createNewAccount.noAccountToCreate: No <1><0>{{currencyName}}</0></1> account was found to create

apps.installSuccess: {{app}} is now installed on your device
apps.uninstallSuccess: {{app}} has been uninstalled from your device
apps.help: Check on your device to see which apps are already installed

firmware.disclaimerTitle: You are about to install <1><0>firmware version {{version}}</0></1>
firmware.disclaimerAppDelete: Apps installed on your device have to be re-installed after the update.
firmware.disclaimerAppReinstall: This does not affect your crypto assets in the blockchain.

modal.confirmIdentifierText: Verify that the identifier on your device is the same as the identifier below. Press the right button to confirm.
modal.mcuFirst: Disconnect the USB cable from your device
modal.mcuSecond: Press the left button and hold it while you reconnect the USB cable until the processing screen appears
modal.mcuPin: If asked on device, please enter your pin code to finish the process
modal.successText: You may re-install the apps on your device

manager.title: Manager
manager.subtitle: Install or uninstall apps on your device

device.title: Connect your device
device.desc: Follow the steps below to open the Manager

confirmAddress.title: Verification
confirmAddress.text: A {{currencyName}} receive address will be displayed on your device. Carefully verify that it matches the address on your computer.

verification.title: Verification
verification.warning: Please verify all transaction details now displayed on your device
verification.body: Once verified, press the right button to confirm and sign the transaction

success.title: Transaction sent
success.text: The transaction has been signed and sent to the network. Your account balance will update once the blockchain has confirmed the transaction.

display.desc: Change settings that affect Ledger Live in general.
display.languageDesc: Set the language displayed in Ledger Live.
display.counterValueDesc: Choose the currency to display next to your balance and operations.
display.exchangeDesc: Choose the provider of the exchange rate from Bitcoin to {{fiat}}. The value of crypto assets is first calculated in Bitcoin, before being converted to {{fiat}} (crypto asset → BTC → {{fiat}}).
display.regionDesc: Choose the region in which you’re located to set the Ledger Live's time zone.
display.stockDesc: Choose Western to display an increase in market value in green. Choose Eastern to display an increase in market value in red.

currencies.desc: Select a crypto asset to edit its settings.
currencies.exchangeDesc: Choose the provider of the rate between {{currencyName}} and Bitcoin. The indicative total value of your portfolio is calculated by converting your {{currencyName}} to Bitcoin, which is then converted to your base currency.
currencies.confirmationsNbDesc: Set the number of network confirmations for a transaction to be marked as confirmed.

profile.passwordDesc: Set a password to prevent unauthorized access to Ledger Live data stored on your computer, including account names, balances, transactions and public addresses.
profile.softResetDesc: Clear the Ledger Live cache to force resynchronization with the blockchain.
profile.hardResetDesc: Erase all Ledger Live data stored on your computer, including your accounts, transaction history and settings.
profile.developerModeDesc: Show developer apps in the Manager and enable testnet apps.
profile.analyticsDesc: Enable analytics of anonymous data to help Ledger improve the user experience. This includes the operating system, language, firmware versions and the number of added accounts.
profile.reportErrorsDesc: Share anonymous usage and diagnostics data to help improve Ledger products, services and security features.
profile.launchOnboardingDesc: Securely initialize or restore a Ledger device to use with Ledger Live. Your accounts and settings are kept.

about.desc: Information about Ledger Live, terms and conditions, and privacy policy.

help.desc: Learn about Ledger Live features or get help.
help.faqDesc: A problem? Get help with Ledger Live, Ledger devices, supported crypto assets and apps.
help.termsDesc: By using Ledger Live you are deemed to have accepted our terms and conditions.
help.privacyDesc: Refer to our privacy policy to learn what personal data we collect, why and how we use it.

hardResetModal.title: Reset Ledger Live
hardResetModal.desc: Erase all Ledger Live data stored on your computer, including your accounts, transaction history and settings. The private keys to access your crypto assets in the blockchain remain secure on your Ledger device and on your Recovery sheet.

softResetModal.title: Clear cache
softResetModal.desc: Clearing the Ledger Live cache forces network resynchronization. Your settings and accounts are not affected. The private keys to access your crypto assets in the blockchain remain secure on your Ledger device and on your Recovery sheet.

resetFallbackModal.title: User action required
resetFallbackModal.part1: Could not delete cache folder. Please delete the folder manually:
resetFallbackModal.part2: Click the Open folder button, the
resetFallbackModal.part5: Then you can restart the app normally.

removeAccountModal.title: Remove account
removeAccountModal.desc: The account will no longer be included in your portfolio. This operation does not affect your assets. Accounts can always be re-added.

openUserDataDirectory.title: View user data
openUserDataDirectory.desc: View the user data that is stored on your computer, including your accounts, caches and settings.

exportLogs.title: Export logs
exportLogs.desc: Exporting Ledger Live logs may be necessary for troubleshooting purposes.

setPassword.title: Enable password lock
setPassword.subTitle: Set a password
setPassword.desc: Make sure to remember your password. Losing your password requires resetting Ledger Live and re-adding accounts.

disablePassword.title: Disable password lock
disablePassword.desc: Ledger Live data will be stored unencrypted on your computer. This includes account names, balances, transactions and public addresses.

crash.uselessText: You may try again by restarting Ledger Live. Please export your logs and contact Ledger Support if the problem persists.

disclaimerModal.title: Trade safely
disclaimerModal.desc_1: Before sending and receiving crypto assets, educate yourself to make informed decisions. Crypto assets are volatile and the prices can go up and down. Carefully evaluate your trading goals and the financial risk you are willing to take.
disclaimerModal.desc_2: Please beware that Ledger does not provide financial, tax, or legal advice. You should take such decisions on your own or consult with reliable experts.

init.title: Get started with your Ledger device

initializedDevice.title: Use a device that's already initialized

noDevice.title: Do not have a Ledger device yet?

disclaimer.note1: Choose your own PIN code, this code will unlock your device.
disclaimer.note2: An 8-digit PIN code offers an optimum level of security.
disclaimer.note3: Never use a device supplied with a PIN code or a 24-word recovery phrase.

nano.step1: Connect the Ledger Nano S to your computer.
nano.step2: Press both buttons simultaneously as instructed on the screen.
nano.step3: Press the right button to select <1><0>Configure as new device?</0></1>
nano.step4: Choose a PIN code between 4 and 8 digits long, followed by the checkmark (✓).

blue.step1: Connect the Ledger Blue to your computer.
blue.step3: Choose a PIN code between 4 and 8 digits long.

nano.step1: Connect the Ledger Nano S to your computer.
nano.step2: Press both buttons simultaneously as instructed on the screen.
nano.step3: Press the left button to cancel <1><0>Initialize as new device?</0></1>. Then press the right button to select <3><0>Restore configuration?</0></3>
nano.step4: Choose a PIN code between 4 and 8 digits long, followed by the checkmark (✓).

blue.step1: Connect the Ledger Blue to your computer.
blue.step3: Choose a PIN code between 4 and 8 digits long.

initialize.title: Save your recovery phrase
initialize.desc: Your device will generate a 24-word recovery phrase to back up your private keys

nano.step1: Copy the word displayed below <1><0>Word #1</0></1> in position 1 on a blank Recovery sheet.
nano.step2: Press the right button to display <1><0>Word #2</0></1> and repeat the process until all 24 words are copied on the Recovery sheet.
nano.step3: Confirm your recovery phrase: select each requested word and press both buttons to validate it.

blue.step1: Copy each word of the recovery phrase on a blank Recovery sheet. Copy the words in the same order.
blue.step2: Tap <1><0>Next</0></1> to move to the next words. Repeat the process until the <3><0>Confirmation</0></3> screen appears.
blue.step3: Type each requested word to confirm your recovery phrase.

restore.title: Enter your recovery phrase
restore.desc: Copy the 24-word recovery phrase from your Recovery sheet on your device.

nano.step1: Select the length of your recovery phrase. Press both buttons to continue.
nano.step2: Select the first letters of <1><0>Word #1</0></1> by pressing the right or left button. Press both buttons to confirm each letter.
nano.step3: Select <1><0>Word #1</0></1> from the suggested words. Press both buttons to continue.
nano.step4: Repeat the process until the last word.

blue.step1: Select the length of your recovery phrase.
blue.step2: Type the first word of your recovery phrase. Select the word when it appears.
blue.step3: Repeat the process until the last word.

disclaimer.note1: Carefully secure your 24-word recovery phrase out of sight.
disclaimer.note2: Make sure you are the sole holder of your recovery phrase.
disclaimer.note3: Ledger does not keep any backup of your recovery phrase.
disclaimer.note4: Never use a device supplied with a recovery phrase or a PIN code.

genuineCheck.title: Security checklist
genuineCheck.descGeneric: Before continuing, please complete the security checklist

step1.title: Did you choose your PIN code by yourself?

step2.title: Did you save your recovery phrase by yourself?

title.pinFailed: Didn't choose your own PIN code?
title.recoveryPhraseFailed: Didn't save your own recovery phrase?
title.isGenuineFail: Oops, your device does not seem genuine...

desc.pinFailed: Never use a device supplied with a PIN code. If your device was provided with a PIN code, please contact us.
desc.recoveryPhraseFailed: Only save a recovery phrase that is displayed on your device. Please contact us in case of doubt. Otherwise, go back to the security checklist.
desc.isGenuineFail: Your device did not pass the authenticity test required to connect to Ledger’s secure server. Please contact Ledger Support to get assistance.

setPassword.title: Password lock (optional)
setPassword.desc: Set a password to prevent unauthorized access to Ledger Live data stored on your computer, including account names, balances, transactions and public addresses.

disclaimer.note1: Make sure to remember your password. Do not share it.
disclaimer.note2: Losing your password requires resetting Ledger Live and re-adding accounts.
disclaimer.note3: Resetting Ledger Live does not affect your crypto assets.

analytics.title: Analytics and bug reports
analytics.desc: Share anonymous usage and diagnostics data to help improve Ledger products, services and security features.

shareAnalytics.title: Share analytics
shareAnalytics.desc: Enable analytics to help Ledger understand how to improve the user experience.

mandatoryContextual.item7: Number of accounts, currencies and operations
mandatoryContextual.item10: Device firmware and app version numbers

sentryLogs.title: Report bugs
sentryLogs.desc: Automatically send reports to help Ledger fix bugs.

technicalData.title: Technical data *
technicalData.desc: Ledger will automatically collect technical information to get basic feedback on usage. This information is anonymous and does not contain personal data.

finish.title: Your device is ready!
finish.desc: Proceed to your portfolio and start adding your accounts...

generic.title: {{message}}
generic.description: Something went wrong. Please retry or contact us.

BtcUnmatchedApp.title: That's the wrong app
BtcUnmatchedApp.description: Open the ‘{{managerAppName}}’ app on your device

DeviceSocketFail.title: Oops, try again
DeviceSocketFail.description: Some connection failed, so please try again.

DeviceSocketNoBulkStatus.title: Oops, try again
DeviceSocketNoBulkStatus.description: Some connection failed, so please try again.

DeviceSocketNoHandler.title: Oops, try again
DeviceSocketNoHandler.description: Some connection failed, so please try again.

DisconnectedDevice.title: Oops, device was disconnected
DisconnectedDevice.description: The connection to the device was lost, so please try again.

HardResetFail.title: Oops, could not reset
HardResetFail.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support.

LatestMCUInstalledError.title: Oops, nothing to update
LatestMCUInstalledError.description: Needlessly tried to update the device microcontroller. Contact Ledger Support if there's a problem with your device.

LedgerAPIError.title: Sorry, try again (API HTTP {{status}})
LedgerAPIError.description: Interacting with Ledger's API server went wrong. Please retry.

LedgerAPIErrorWithMessage.title: Oops, {{message}}
LedgerAPIErrorWithMessage.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support.

LedgerAPINotAvailable.title: Sorry, {{currencyName}} services unavailable
LedgerAPINotAvailable.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support.

ManagerAppAlreadyInstalled.title: Oops, that's already installed.
ManagerAppAlreadyInstalled.description: Check your device to see which apps are already installed.

ManagerAppRelyOnBTC.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum apps required
ManagerAppRelyOnBTC.description: Install the latest Bitcoin and Ethereum apps first.

ManagerDeviceLocked.title: Please unlock your device
ManagerDeviceLocked.description: Your device was locked. Please unlock it.

ManagerNotEnoughSpace.title: Sorry, not enough storage left
ManagerNotEnoughSpace.description: Please uninstall some apps to make space. This will not affect your crypto assets.

ManagerUninstallBTCDep.title: Sorry, this app is required
ManagerUninstallBTCDep.description: Uninstall the Bitcoin or Ethereum app last.

NoAddressesFound.title: Sorry, no accounts found
NoAddressesFound.description: Something went wrong with address calculation, try again or contact Ledger Support.

NotEnoughBalance.title: Oops, insufficient balance
NotEnoughBalance.description: Make sure the account to debit has sufficient balance

NotEnoughBalanceBecauseDestinationNotCre.title: Recipient address is inactive. Send at least {{minimalAmount}} to activate it

PasswordIncorrect.title: The password you entered is incorrect

TimeoutError.title: Oops, a time out occurred
TimeoutError.description: It took too long for the server to respond.

TimeoutTagged.title: Oops, a time out occurred ({{tag}})
TimeoutTagged.description: It took too long for the server to respond.

TransportError.title: Something went wrong. Please reconnect your device.

TransportStatusError.title: Something went wrong. Please reconnect your device.

UserRefusedFirmwareUpdate.title: Firmware update refused on device
UserRefusedFirmwareUpdate.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support

UserRefusedOnDevice.title: Transaction refused on device
UserRefusedOnDevice.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support in case of doubt.

UserRefusedAddress.title: Receive address rejected
UserRefusedAddress.description: Please try again or contact Ledger Support

UpdateYourApp.title: App update required
UpdateYourApp.description: Uninstall and reinstall the {{managerAppName}} app in the Manager

WrongDeviceForAccount.title: Oops, wrong device for ‘{{accountName}}’.
WrongDeviceForAccount.description: The connected device is not associated with the account you selected. Please connect the right device.

DeviceAppVerifyNotSupported.title: Open Manager to update this App
DeviceAppVerifyNotSupported.description: The app verification is not supported

InvalidAddress.title: This is not a valid {{currencyName}} address

CantOpenDevice.title: Oops, couldn’t connect to device
CantOpenDevice.description: Device detected but connection failed. Please retry and get help if the problem persists.

ETHAddressNonEIP.title: Auto-verification not available: carefully verify the address

CantScanQRCode.title: Couldn't scan this QR-code: auto-verification not supported by this address

FeeNotLoaded.title: Couldn’t load fee rates. Please set manual fees
